Class BabelNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelNet

  • public abstract class BabelNet
extends Object
    A class to programmatically access BabelNet.

    navigli, vannella, cecconi

      List<BabelSynset> getSynsetsFromWikipediaTitle(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language, String title, BabelPOS pos)
      Deprecated. 
      use getSynsets(ResourceID... resourceId) instead.

      Example: 

       List<BabelSynset> synset = bn.getSynsets(new WikipediaID("BabelNet", Language.EN, BabelPOS.NOUN));
      abstract BabelVersion getVersion()
      Gets the version of loaded BabelNet indices

        Parameters:
        word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
        langs - a collection of languages that can be used to look up the input word.
        normalized - enables normalized search
        Returns:
        the senses of the word.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getSynsetsFromWikipediaTitle

        @Deprecated
public List<BabelSynset> getSynsetsFromWikipediaTitle(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,
                                                                  String title,
                                                                  BabelPOS pos)
                                                           throws IOException
        Deprecated. use getSynsets(ResourceID... resourceId) instead.

        Example: 

         List<BabelSynset> synset = bn.getSynsets(new WikipediaID("BabelNet", Language.EN, BabelPOS.NOUN));
        Given a Wikipedia title, returns the BabelSynsets which contain it.
        Parameters:
        language - the language of the input Wikipedia title.
        title - the language of the Wikipedia page.
        pos - the PoS of the Wikipedia title.
        Returns:
        the set of BabelSynsets associated to the given Wikipedia title
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getVersion

        Gets the version of loaded BabelNet indices
        Returns:
        the BabelVersion of BabelNet indices

      • getSynset

        public BabelSynset getSynset(ResourceID resourceID)
                      throws IOException
        Given a ResourceID, returns the sense identified by the ResourceID in input.

        Note: It is possible that this method gives a warning if the ResourceID returns more than one synset. In that case the best (see BabelSynsetComparator) sense will be returned.

        Parameters:
        resourceId - the resource identifier
        Returns:
        the sense identified by the ResourceID
        Throws:
        IOException -

        Below, some more examples that can be used:

        Retrieving BabelSynset from a Wikipedia page title: 

        
  BabelSynset synset = bn.getSynset(new WikipediaID("BabelNet", Language.EN, BabelPOS.NOUN));

        Retrieving BabelSynset from a Wikiquote page title: 

        
  BabelSynset synset =  bn.getSynset(new WikiquoteID("Home", Language.EN, BabelPOS.NOUN));

        Retrieving BabelSynset from a WordNet id: 

        
  BabelSynset synset = bn.getSynset(new WordNetSynsetID("wn:03544360n"));

        Retrieving BabelSynset from a Wikidata page id: 

        
  BabelSynset synset = bn.getSynset(new WikidataID("Q4837690"));

        Retrieving BabelSynset from a OmegaWiki page id: 

        
  BabelSynset synset = bn.getSynset(new OmegaWikiID("1499705"));

      • getSynset

        public abstract BabelSynset getSynset(Collection<it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language> filterLangs,
                                      ResourceID resourceID)
                               throws IOException
        Given a ResourceID, returns the sense identified by the ResourceID in input.

        Note: It is possible that this method gives a warning if the ResourceID returns more than one synset. In that case the best (see BabelSynsetComparator) sense will be returned.

        Parameters:
        filterLangs - the languages in which the data are to be retrieved.
        resourceId - the resource identifier
        Returns:
        the sense identified by the ResourceID
        Throws:
        IOException
